description: Export emails for multiple contacts to CSV. Accepts EmailExportInput with contacts array (each contact requires firstName, lastName, and either domain or website). Creates export job via UserExport model. Returns EmailExportResponse with exportId, downloadUrl (signed URL, expires after 24 hours), expiresAt, contactCount, companyCount, and status (pending, processing, completed, failed). Credits: 1 credit per contact (FreeUser/ProUser only).
